DOC.brief_summary: Patient/Population : Women age 18 , pregnant undergoing benign , robotic-assisted gynecologic procedure Lutheran General Hospital . Intervention : Decreasing angle Trendelenburg procedure Control : Steep Trendelenburg , usual standard care , limit operative bed , 30 degree . Outcome : Outcomes include mean angle Trendelenburg experimental arm difference Trendelenburg two arm . Additional outcome include end tidal Carbon dioxide , peak airway pressure , mean arterial pressure , heart rate arterial Carbon dioxide . Secondary outcome include operative time , blood loss conversion laparotomy .
DOC.brief_title: Does Less Trendelenburg Make Difference Robotic Assisted Gynecological Procedures ?
